message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product.  Given its value, I think a starting price of $14,000 is fair. What do you think?
I appreciate your time, Alice. I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12,500. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your perspective, but the product is worth significantly more to me than that. Could you meet me halfway at $13,250?
I appreciate your persistence, Alice. I'm willing to meet you halfway from your previous offer, but I'm thinking more along the lines of $13,000. Is that something you'd consider?
